entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -1.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow mixed with freezing rain ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 09:45 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 09:45 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 09:45 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
